meanings.definition: The state or quality of being anonymous.
meanings.sent1: The anonymousnesses of the online forum allowed users to share their thoughts freely.
meanings.sent2: The anonymousnesses of the masked hero intrigued the townspeople.
meanings.sent3: The anonymousnesses of the mysterious gift-giver added an element of surprise to the party.
meanings.sent4: Her anonymousnesses in the crowd made her feel like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The cloak of anonymousnesses shielded his true identity from prying eyes.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unknown or unidentified.
meanings.sent1: The anonymousnesses of the sender made it difficult to trace the origin of the letter.
meanings.sent2: The anonymousnesses of the masked figure left the detectives puzzled.
meanings.sent3: The anonymousnesses of the new student sparked curiosity among classmates.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of anonymousnesses, she felt like a lost ship searching for a harbor.
meanings.sent5: The anonymousnesses of the ghostly figure sent shivers down their spines.
